items.badge_description: After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 105 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 22!

beer.beer_description: Brewed by Forst in Lagundo (Bolzano, BZ)

items.badge_description: Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 35 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 8!

Some may argue that wine is better than beer, especially in a country so well known for its vineyards. We all know they’re wrong. Cheers! That’s 5 beers from a brewery in Italy. Try 5 more for Level 2.

beer.beer_description: Brewed by Forst in Lagundo (Bolzano, BZ)

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 160 distinct venues!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 340 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower.

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 325 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 66!

beer.beer_description: Brewed by Forst in Lagundo (Bolzano, BZ)

items.badge_description: Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 280 different venues categorized as a Restaurant.  Try 5 more for Level 57!
